title: mart
author: mart
created_time: June 21, 2023, 01:10:08 PMLast edit: June 25, 2023, 07:59:33 AM by mart
content: https://casascius.uberbills.com/?address=18WEgEpB5qdCJ8dLBdywtNkHDHCey1iaTcThe coin is in normal condition, but about an half of the public address in the back has worn out.I bought the coin myself in 2011 from https://casascius.com/The coin is currently located in Estonia.Waiting for offers

comments.author: mart
comments.body: Doesn't seem to be much interest in keeping the historic coin loaded I guess I will just peel the key

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: You listed as auction without a starting price, what are you expecting?

comments.author: mart
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on June 24, 2023, 04:13:50 PMYou listed as auction without a starting price, what are you expecting?Ups, good point!So starting price 1 BTC it is!

comments.author: bitdaryl
comments.body: Can MJ Escrow? Also, when does the auction end? This seems more like a "WTS".

comments.body: Quote from: bitdaryl on June 24, 2023, 06:27:13 PMCan MJ Escrow? Also, when does the auction end? This seems more like a "WTS". Happy to escrow if needed

comments.author: mart
comments.body: Quote from: bitdaryl on June 24, 2023, 06:27:13 PMCan MJ Escrow? Also, when does the auction end? This seems more like a "WTS". Escrow is reasonable.Changed the type/title from "[AUCTION]" to "[WTS]".

comments.author: mart
comments.body: Got an offer of 1.22 BTC in DM  Any better offers?

comments.author: RvWensen
comments.body: Quote from: mart on June 25, 2023, 08:41:08 AMGot an offer of 1.22 BTC in DM  Any better offers?Smells like BS.You should have just set the starting price at 1.2 if that's the minimum you want.Good luck selling to whoever DMed you

comments.author: mart
comments.body: Quote from: RvWensen on June 25, 2023, 03:51:46 PMSmells like BS.Why?Is the offer of 1.22 BTC too high?Anyway, I'll wait for few more days to see if there will be more offers.

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: I just made a deal for a 2013 Cas around that price in a sale. I don’t think the 1.2ish is out of line. Good luck with sale.

comments.body: Quote from: Spokanistan51 on June 26, 2023, 12:52:43 AMI just made a deal for a 2013 Cas around that price in a sale. I don’t think the 1.2ish is out of line. Good luck with sale. Thanks!

comments.author: mart
comments.body: So today morning I received two offers of 1.23 BTC in DM.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Looks like mj is winning the public auction at 1 BTC so far, when does this end? I'm more of a lurking sniper lol

comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on June 27, 2023, 05:23:55 PMLooks like mj is winning the public auction at 1 BTC so far, when does this end? I'm more of a lurking sniper lolMJ also made a private offer of 1.05 BTC  I'll wait for few more days with the offers.

I'm more of a lurking sniper lolMJ also made a private offer of 1.05 BTC  I'll wait for few more days with the offers.I did?

comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on June 27, 2023, 07:40:29 PMQuote from: mart on June 27, 2023, 07:34:31 PMQuote from: Hookzup1 on June 27, 2023, 05:23:55 PMLooks like mj is winning the public auction at 1 BTC so far, when does this end? I'm more of a lurking sniper lolMJ also made a private offer of 1.05 BTC  I'll wait for few more days with the offers.I did?Someone with your name contacted me in Telegram.https://t.me/MlNERJONES:"Hello , i am just updating you about your WTS/Auction thread at forum. My offer stands at 1.05BTC ,if you dont get any other bids.Also if you do ,i am glad to escrow it for youSincerely,MJ"So, that wasn't you?

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: I highly suggest you read this post before you get scammed out of your coin... https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0and posting what offers you have had in dm are irrelevant. Impossible to verify and makes people who are actually interested in buying your coin think twice about giving you an offer.
